title: AskUI vs Traditional QA Tools: A Factual Comparison for 2025
excerpt: AskUI vs traditional test automation tools: A fact-based breakdown of visual UI testing versus selector-based scripting in 2025.
content:
Most established UI test tools such as Selenium, Cypress, and Playwright use selectors to interact with web elements through the DOM. These include identifiers like class, or XPath, which must be kept consistent for tests to remain reliable.
